name: Elemental Echo
description: Inflict [Ignite], [Shock], or [Chill] to trigger [Elemental Reactions] against enemies, dealing damage while weaknening their combat abilities.

name: Wild Spirit
description: Accumulate Rage when losing HP. Upon reaching full Rage, enter the [Wild] state, to enhance combat abilities.

name: Arcane Wisdom
description: Gain [Awakening] when an ally uses Overdrive. Consume or build up [Awakening] stacks to enhance skills.

name: Sanctum Glory
description: By gaining [Morale] and [Fervo], enter the [Grace] state to apply a Self Buff and enhance combat abilities.

name: Otherworld Return
description: Gain [Deathrattle] when an ally falls. The more [Deathrattle] stacks you have, the stronger your combat abilities become.

name: Illusion Veil
description: Some of your skills with trigger the [Punishment] effect on enemies whose Overdrive Energy Consumption is 4 or higher, applying a Buff to enhance the current skill's effect.
